name: travel-blog-builder
description: Build script for travel blog - geocodes locations and converts markdown offline

scripts.dev: node scripts/build-smart.js && concurrently "npm run watch" "node scripts/server.js 8000"
scripts.writing: node scripts/build-smart.js && concurrently "npm run watch:writing" "node scripts/server.js 8000"
scripts.test: node scripts/test-nav.js && node scripts/test-filter.js && node scripts/test-css-injection.js && node scripts/test-maps.js
